label: A_oP16_55_2g2h-001
title: R-carbon Structure
comments: This is a predicted ``superhard'' allotrope of carbon.  Shortly after this paper was published, another paper predicted a similar phase, called ``H-Carbon'' (He, 2012a; He, 2012b).  The similarity between the two structures can be seen by shifting the origin by $\frac12 \mathbf{a_1}$.  Other sources (Zhao, 2012) refer to this structure as ``O-Carbon.''
